After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.KPIS: Average response time to customer inquiries
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the average response time to customer inquiries.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Inquiries / Total Number of Inquiries

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures customer satisfaction with support interactions.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Support Interactions

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the total number of customer complaints resolved.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: Total Number of Customer Complaints Resolved

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of customers retained over a specific period.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: ((Number of Customers at End of Period - New Customers Acquired) / Number of Customers at Start of Period) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the productivity of the customer support team.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: Total Number of Support Cases Resolved / Total Team Hours

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.KPIS: Rate of repeat customer support inquiries
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the rate of repeat inquiries from customers.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: (Number of Repeat Inquiries / Total Number of Inquiries) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.KPIS: Quality of support provided (e.g., resolution accuracy)
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of resolutions provided by support.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Resolutions / Total Number of Resolutions) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.EXPLANATION: Measures customer feedback on support services.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Custome.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Feedback on Support Services
